title: Column icons not displayed in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not being displayed in the Available Items section of the Data Source.
OB: When expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon in the Available Items section, the column icons do not show up.
EB: The expected result is that the table icons and column icons should be displayed when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database with the following details: 
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
   - User Name: root 
   - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 
6. [Additional steps needed to reproduce the issue.]
